attributes.action: Breakfast club and asc to come back or free school meals for key worker kids
attributes.additional_details:
Key workers are not given any type of bonus or incentive to work through this crisis. 
Yet all worse off parents are entitled to free meals and free schooling. 
As a key worker you are still expected to carry on as normal with no extra incentives whilst you should be prepared to work through a crisis 
All I ask is breakfast club and asc to be re inforced to help key worker parents and not stress about childcare 
From my point of view working parents are the forgotten during this difficult time
attributes.background:
As key worker parents school being open 9-3 is great but not sufficient due to parents working hours. I propose breakfast club and after school club reopening for key worker parents or free school meals for these pupils as some kind of incentive
As a worker you are not entitled to free school meals

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petition:

Free meals for Key Workers children and pay back from march till now
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555836
